summary: Tj’s New Style
title: Tj’s New Style
body:
Disclaimer: this is my first fic. I just want to apologize in advance. It’s not very good.

Tj woke up at 6:20 am to the incessant sound of beeping from his phone. He was up till 3:30 that night finishing a project and wanted nothing more than to go to bed, so he did exactly that. Groggily, he rolled over and shut off his alarm, falling back asleep (for what he swore would only be 5 minutes) before he could stop himself. The problem is, by the time he woke up again it was 6:50 and he had to be out of the house in 10 minutes.

“Shit! I can’t believe I slept in this late!” Dragging himself out of bed, he quickly picked out the first clothes he found and ran downstairs to eat breakfast, leaving no time to do his usual hair routine before heading out.

“You’re lookin a little stressed there Tj” mocked Amber as she waited at the front door for her brother. “We’ve gotta go or we’re gonna be late”

“Yeah yeah I overslept a bit, let me just go grab my bookbag.”

Tj was so tired that it took till he was almost at school to realize that he had forgotten to put in his contact lenses, which meant that he’d have to wear his glasses all day and he hated that. For the most part Tj could see fine, but when it came to reading he really needed them and he knew he had a test today. Grabbing the glasses from his bag and putting them on, he thought about how much he just wanted to see Cyrus now, knowing he was probably the one person who could always cheer him up.

A few minutes later Tj found him at his locker talking to Buffy and Andi before class started and decided to head over. Wow he looks so cute today.. Does he always look this good? Of course he does it’s Cyrus! And ugh I look like this today.. Whatever, just play it cool. Taking his own advice he walked up to the boy, casually slinging an arm around his shoulders.

“Well Kippen, this is certainly a new look for you” Buffy joked, looking at his unusually fluffy hair and glasses that were most definitely NOT the regular style of Tj Kippen. “I agree” added Andi, “it’s not bad, I think it actually makes you look nicer.”

“Uh thanks. It wasn’t exactly planned..” According to his own opinions, ironically, the glasses made him look stupid. “Well what about you Cyrus? What do you think?” Tj figured he’d ask since they were already discussing it. He also noticed Cyrus hadn’t said anything yet which was sort of starting to make Tj worry that he didn’t like the “I ran out of the house ten minutes late” look.

Instead, Cyrus stood there with a huge dorky grin on his face, admiring Tj and this relaxed style that he seemed to have today. “Oh I uh- it’s really- you look- I mean- wow…” Normally it would feel awkward but the lack of a sentence seemed to be enough to make the older boy flattered, the red tint spreading along his cheeks at the same time as Cyrus’s. “I just mean that you look good, -uh it, your hair, it looks good like that. Yup, that’s it I’ll stop now,” Cyrus laughed uneasily. He suddenly made eye contact with Tj and neither of them really stopped it.

At that point Buffy that felt her and Andi should probably go, so she broke the silence that was starting to set in. “Come on we’d better get to class before we’re late.” She grabbed Andi’s arm and started moving her away but the girl protested, not understanding what Buffy was trying to do. “Wait what we still have 5 minutes?” Then, not so subtly giving Andi the come on lets leave them alone look, Buffy said “oh yeah what I mean is I have to go get something from my locker and I need Andi to come with me.” She was usually better at making up excuses but it didn’t matter, Andi got what she was doing and followed along with it. “Right! I forgot something in there yesterday and I uh.. need it for class! See you guys in a few!”

After Andi and Buffy walked away Tj realized he still had his arm on Cyrus’s shoulder and decided to keep it there anyways because hey, Cyrus didn’t say anything yet, and Tj definitely didn’t mind. He’s had a crush on Cyrus for a few months now, he’s just never had the courage to say anything. But something today, out of nowhere, something changed while seeing Cyrus and he couldn’t explain it. Even with himself looking like a mess, he knew in that moment that today was when he had to tell him his feelings whether or not Cyrus would feel the same way.

“Sooo underdog, can you meet me after school at the swings?”

“Of course! Is there any reason?”

“No not really I just want to tell you something but I don’t think we have the time right now,” he mentioned to the younger boy conveniently as the bell went off. “See you later?”

Cyrus smirked, “I’ll be there.” As Tj hugged the boy, he hoped that he wasn’t able to feel how quickly his heart was beating. Buh bum, buh bum, buh bum, buh bum. It was probably petty good though that Cyrus just hoped the exact same thing to himself.

Throughout the whole rest of the day all Tj did was worry, what if he doesn’t like me? I don’t even know if he’s gay.. he kissed that girl Iris, right? Oh no. He’s straight. Ok stop I just have to tell him and get it off my chest or else I literally might die of this crush if I don’t. As soon as the bell rang for his last class Tj tried to push these thoughts to the back of his mind and pack up his stuff in a hurry to get to the swings.

He was pretty fast and got their first, so he decided to pick a swing and wait for Cyrus. It’s gonna be fine, he convinced himself. Even if I do look like a total mess today.. I wish I had my hair gel or at least my freaking contacts. Stupid homework. At that last thought he looked up and saw Cyrus making his way over and take the swing right beside his own.

“Hey teej! How was your day?”

“It was pretty good actually, I think I passed my math test and I knew most of the answers! Your tutoring has been helping a lot.” He smiled to himself at that. Having Cyrus teach him was probably the only thing that got him through math anymore, which is what he considered the most unbearable subject ever.

“Good! I’m really proud of you, you’ve been working hard to maintain that grade.” Although he was calm on the outside, Tj was screaming on the inside about how much he liked this boy. “Oh! So what did you want to talk about?” Cyrus asked briskly.

Alright, here it goes. “Right. Well you see I guess, no I- I know, I like you Cyrus. I have for a while but I really didn’t want to mess up what we have already. If you don’t feel the same way I get it, I’m kind of used to disappointment anyways. I mean hell, I don’t even know if you’re gay. I just had to get this off my chest.” Uhhhh was all that came out of Cyrus’s mouth as he stared at Tj who just confessed his feelings for him. A few more seconds of silence went by and Tj, feeling his heart drop to the bottom of his stomach, started to speak again “right. Classic Tj. Anything good in my life I gotta mess it up. I’m sorry Cyrus, I didn’t want to make you feel uncomfortable around me. I’ll go and we can forget this happened.” As he got up from the swing Cyrus quickly grabbed his arm and pulled him back, a little closer then he planned.

“No wait Tj- It’s just that I’m in shock that you actually feel that way about me. I mean of course I like you too, I kinda thought it was pretty obvious, I’m not very good at hiding my feelings” Cyrus admitted, hoping Tj wasn’t still upset.

“You seriously don’t understand how relieved I am to hear that. I like you so much and honestly, I thought I’d lose you if I admitted how I feel, especially knowing I haven’t been the best person to be around in the past.” Tj sighed, much more relaxed than before. They were just a few inches apart at this point, but Cyrus only grabbed Tjs hand to hold.  

“I meeaann.. you’re not wrong, you might have had some rough moments in the past but that’s just it. The past. You changed so much and that’s what I admire about you most, the way you made yourself better and proved to me multiple times that you’re a good person”

“Thank you for believing in me Cyrus. I was kinda starting to lose hope in myself.”

“Hey it’s just another service I provide.” He replied with a small laugh. Tj started to lean in now, leaving barely any space between them.

“Is it alright if I kiss you underdog?”

“Definitely” Cyrus smirked, unable to stop his smile. The kiss made Tjs heart beat even faster than it already was and although it wasn’t very long it was the best feeling in the world.

Looking up a few seconds later with totally pink cheeks, Cyrus stated “by the way, I almost died when I saw you with the glasses and messy hair. I mean what I really wanted to say earlier is you look adorable but of course I thought you were Mr straight not-so-scary basketball guy, turns out you’re just a real softie.”

“First of all, I can’t believe you thought I was straight. I’ve been dropping hints basically forever. Secondly… huh, maybe I should change my style. Tj the not-so-scary basketball guy who rocks messy hair and glasses.”

“Oh no” Cyrus joked. “I wouldn’t be able to take it. You’d look too cute for me to handle.”

“Then it’s just fair Cy. I’ve had to deal with that every day for the past half year” Cyrus blushed even more but Tj still couldn’t believe this was happening. It probably had to be the best day of his life in this exact moment. He pulled Cyrus in for a close hug and softly kissed the top of his head, closing his eyes for a second, just taking in everything that happened. Cyrus likes me. I kissed Cyrus. Holy shit I kissed Cyrus!!

It only took them a week to come out officially as boyfriends, and Tj was more than happy to give in to Cyrus’s constant demand for forehead kisses. It really was so easy being around him and maybe unlike hair or glasses, dating Cyrus definitely wouldn’t be one of his problems.

I’ll go and we can forget this happened.” As he got up from the swing Cyrus quickly grabbed his arm and pulled him back, a little closer then he planned.

“No wait Tj- It’s just that I’m in shock that you actually feel that way about me. I mean of course I like you too, I kinda thought it was pretty obvious, I’m not very good at hiding my feelings” Cyrus admitted, hoping Tj wasn’t still upset.

“You seriously don’t understand how relieved I am to hear that. I like you so much and honestly, I thought I’d lose you if I admitted how I feel, especially knowing I haven’t been the best person to be around in the past.” Tj sighed, much more relaxed than before. They were just a few inches apart at this point, but Cyrus only grabbed Tjs hand to hold.  

“I meeaann.. you’re not wrong, you might have had some rough moments in the past but that’s just it. The past. You changed so much and that’s what I admire about you most, the way you made yourself better and proved to me multiple times that you’re a good person”

“Thank you for believing in me Cyrus. I was kinda starting to lose hope in myself.”

“Hey it’s just another service I provide.” He replied with a small laugh. Tj started to lean in now, leaving barely any space between them.

“Is it alright if I kiss you underdog?”

“Definitely” Cyrus smirked, unable to stop his smile. The kiss made Tjs heart beat even faster than it already was and although it wasn’t very long it was the best feeling in the world.

Looking up a few seconds later with totally pink cheeks, Cyrus stated “by the way, I almost died when I saw you with the glasses and messy hair. I mean what I really wanted to say earlier is you look adorable but of course I thought you were Mr straight not-so-scary basketball guy, turns out you’re just a real softie.”

“First of all, I can’t believe you thought I was straight. I’ve been dropping hints basically forever. Secondly… huh, maybe I should change my style. Tj the not-so-scary basketball guy who rocks messy hair and glasses.”

“Oh no” Cyrus joked. “I wouldn’t be able to take it. You’d look too cute for me to handle.”

“Then it’s just fair Cy. I’ve had to deal with that every day for the past half year” Cyrus blushed even more but Tj still couldn’t believe this was happening. It probably had to be the best day of his life in this exact moment. He pulled Cyrus in for a close hug and softly kissed the top of his head, closing his eyes for a second, just taking in everything that happened. Cyrus likes me. I kissed Cyrus. Holy shit I kissed Cyrus!!

It only took them a week to come out officially as boyfriends, and Tj was more than happy to give in to Cyrus’s constant demand for forehead kisses. It really was so easy being around him and maybe unlike hair or glasses, dating Cyrus definitely wouldn’t be one of his problems.

Tj woke up at 6:20 am to the incessant sound of beeping from his phone. He was up till 3:30 that night finishing a project and wanted nothing more than to go to bed, so he did exactly that. Groggily, he rolled over and shut off his alarm, falling back asleep (for what he swore would only be 5 minutes) before he could stop himself. The problem is, by the time he woke up again it was 6:50 and he had to be out of the house in 10 minutes.

“Shit! I can’t believe I slept in this late!” Dragging himself out of bed, he quickly picked out the first clothes he found and ran downstairs to eat breakfast, leaving no time to do his usual hair routine before heading out.

“You’re lookin a little stressed there Tj” mocked Amber as she waited at the front door for her brother. “We’ve gotta go or we’re gonna be late”

“Yeah yeah I overslept a bit, let me just go grab my bookbag.”

Tj was so tired that it took till he was almost at school to realize that he had forgotten to put in his contact lenses, which meant that he’d have to wear his glasses all day and he hated that. For the most part Tj could see fine, but when it came to reading he really needed them and he knew he had a test today. Grabbing the glasses from his bag and putting them on, he thought about how much he just wanted to see Cyrus now, knowing he was probably the one person who could always cheer him up.

A few minutes later Tj found him at his locker talking to Buffy and Andi before class started and decided to head over. Wow he looks so cute today.. Does he always look this good? Of course he does it’s Cyrus! And ugh I look like this today.. Whatever, just play it cool. Taking his own advice he walked up to the boy, casually slinging an arm around his shoulders.

“Well Kippen, this is certainly a new look for you” Buffy joked, looking at his unusually fluffy hair and glasses that were most definitely NOT the regular style of Tj Kippen. “I agree” added Andi, “it’s not bad, I think it actually makes you look nicer.”

“Uh thanks. It wasn’t exactly planned..” According to his own opinions, ironically, the glasses made him look stupid. “Well what about you Cyrus? What do you think?” Tj figured he’d ask since they were already discussing it. He also noticed Cyrus hadn’t said anything yet which was sort of starting to make Tj worry that he didn’t like the “I ran out of the house ten minutes late” look.

Instead, Cyrus stood there with a huge dorky grin on his face, admiring Tj and this relaxed style that he seemed to have today. “Oh I uh- it’s really- you look- I mean- wow…” Normally it would feel awkward but the lack of a sentence seemed to be enough to make the older boy flattered, the red tint spreading along his cheeks at the same time as Cyrus’s. “I just mean that you look good, -uh it, your hair, it looks good like that. Yup, that’s it I’ll stop now,” Cyrus laughed uneasily. He suddenly made eye contact with Tj and neither of them really stopped it.

At that point Buffy that felt her and Andi should probably go, so she broke the silence that was starting to set in. “Come on we’d better get to class before we’re late.” She grabbed Andi’s arm and started moving her away but the girl protested, not understanding what Buffy was trying to do. “Wait what we still have 5 minutes?” Then, not so subtly giving Andi the come on lets leave them alone look, Buffy said “oh yeah what I mean is I have to go get something from my locker and I need Andi to come with me.” She was usually better at making up excuses but it didn’t matter, Andi got what she was doing and followed along with it. “Right! I forgot something in there yesterday and I uh.. need it for class! See you guys in a few!”

After Andi and Buffy walked away Tj realized he still had his arm on Cyrus’s shoulder and decided to keep it there anyways because hey, Cyrus didn’t say anything yet, and Tj definitely didn’t mind. He’s had a crush on Cyrus for a few months now, he’s just never had the courage to say anything. But something today, out of nowhere, something changed while seeing Cyrus and he couldn’t explain it. Even with himself looking like a mess, he knew in that moment that today was when he had to tell him his feelings whether or not Cyrus would feel the same way.

“Sooo underdog, can you meet me after school at the swings?”

“Of course! Is there any reason?”

“No not really I just want to tell you something but I don’t think we have the time right now,” he mentioned to the younger boy conveniently as the bell went off. “See you later?”

Cyrus smirked, “I’ll be there.” As Tj hugged the boy, he hoped that he wasn’t able to feel how quickly his heart was beating. Buh bum, buh bum, buh bum, buh bum. It was probably petty good though that Cyrus just hoped the exact same thing to himself.

Throughout the whole rest of the day all Tj did was worry, what if he doesn’t like me? I don’t even know if he’s gay.. he kissed that girl Iris, right? Oh no. He’s straight. Ok stop I just have to tell him and get it off my chest or else I literally might die of this crush if I don’t. As soon as the bell rang for his last class Tj tried to push these thoughts to the back of his mind and pack up his stuff in a hurry to get to the swings.

He was pretty fast and got their first, so he decided to pick a swing and wait for Cyrus. It’s gonna be fine, he convinced himself. Even if I do look like a total mess today.. I wish I had my hair gel or at least my freaking contacts. Stupid homework. At that last thought he looked up and saw Cyrus making his way over and take the swing right beside his own.

“Hey teej! How was your day?”

“It was pretty good actually, I think I passed my math test and I knew most of the answers! Your tutoring has been helping a lot.” He smiled to himself at that. Having Cyrus teach him was probably the only thing that got him through math anymore, which is what he considered the most unbearable subject ever.

“Good! I’m really proud of you, you’ve been working hard to maintain that grade.” Although he was calm on the outside, Tj was screaming on the inside about how much he liked this boy. “Oh! So what did you want to talk about?” Cyrus asked briskly.

Alright, here it goes. “Right. Well you see I guess, no I- I know, I like you Cyrus. I have for a while but I really didn’t want to mess up what we have already. If you don’t feel the same way I get it, I’m kind of used to disappointment anyways. I mean hell, I don’t even know if you’re gay. I just had to get this off my chest.” Uhhhh was all that came out of Cyrus’s mouth as he stared at Tj who just confessed his feelings for him. “First of all, I can’t believe you thought I was straight. I’ve been dropping hints basically forever. Secondly… huh, maybe I should change my style. Tj the not-so-scary basketball guy who rocks messy hair and glasses.”

“Oh no” Cyrus joked. “I wouldn’t be able to take it. You’d look too cute for me to handle.”

“Then it’s just fair Cy. I’ve had to deal with that every day for the past half year” Cyrus blushed even more but Tj still couldn’t believe this was happening. He pulled Cyrus in for a close hug and softly kissed the top of his head, closing his eyes for a second, just taking in everything that happened. Cyrus likes me. I kissed Cyrus. Holy shit I kissed Cyrus!!

It only took them a week to come out officially as boyfriends, and Tj was more than happy to give in to Cyrus’s constant demand for forehead kisses. It really was so easy being around him and maybe unlike hair or glasses, dating Cyrus definitely wouldn’t be one of his problems.

summary: THEIR FIRST I LOVE YOUS
question: THEIR FIRST I LOVE YOUS
answer:
Anonymous said:

your take on Tj and Cyrus’s first kiss

Anonymous said:

TJ comforting Cyrus with hugs (but they aren’t dating)

Anonymous said:

a n y h u r t / c o m f o r t

Me: why not all four? :)

Cyrus was sitting on his bedroom floor with a huge bowl of ice cream. He was so upset and hurt from what happened. He couldn’t do anything more than sit in his room, feel bad, eat a chocolate ice cream and cry, until there were knocks on his door. “Mom, I said don’t interrupt me, I want to be alone” he sobbed, putting another spoon full of creamy goodness in his mouth. “Not even if I’m here?” he heard a voice who was not his mom’s: but his crush’s.

Cyrus looked at the older while realizing he is wearing sweatpants full of snack’s leftovers on them and his dad’s t-shirt, who was three sizes too big for him. Before he knew it, Tj was sitting next to him and was putting his arms around him.

He did not want to give into the hug, although he really needed a friend at the moment. He sobbed into Tj’s hoodie. “I do not understand why they are so mean to me…” he wiped a tear off his face. “What have I ever done to them?” he kept on sobbing until he finally calmed down, which is when Tj allowed himself to pull back.

He brushed his hand against Cyrus’s messy hair, looked at his big brown eyes and couldn’t help himself anymore. “Cyrus, it’s not you. You are the most amazing person to be living on this planet, and you are an incredible being. I love you, Cyrus,” he admitted. “Thank you, Teej, that’s very helpful” the younger sneaked a smirk. “No, underdog, I mean it. I really love you. As more than a friend.” He added, looking down. “Ever since I met you, I’ve been constantly falling in love with you. You are the most wonderful person I have ever met; all I want to do is become a better person because of you. All I want is you to be happy, and to see your little smile, that bright up my entire universe.” He kept on confessing, since it felt good, finally letting it all out. Although now, he had realized what was said.

“Oh- I’m, I’m sorry. You know. I know it’s embarrassing, and you probably don’t feel the same way and if you don’t want to be friends with me I’ll understand… it’s truly okay if you feel uncomfortabl-“ he was quickly shut down as the other’s lips softly touched his, kissing him softly. They both were into this kiss; they wanted it for so long; it was just the right place and the right time.

“I think you are amazing, Tj Kippen. And I love you”
